unittitle_ssm: Peter Cohen collection of New York City snapshots
abstract_ssm: A small collection of amateur, anonymous snapshots of New York City scenes (most in black and white, a handful in color) taken between 1891 and 1981. Along with ubiquitous tourist subjects, such as the Empire State Building and the 1939 World's Fair, the collection includes rare views of early Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parades, which document the first appearances of the balloons "Mickey Mouse" (1934) and "Superman" (1940).
